name: py-pyodbc
description:
A Python DB API 2 module for ODBC. This project provides an up-to-date,
convenient interface to ODBC using native data types like datetime and
decimal.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: unixodbc
dependencies.description:
ODBC is an open specification for providing application developers with
a predictable API with which to access Data Sources. Data Sources
include SQL Servers and any Data Source with an ODBC Driver.
